channel.title: Change Level
channel.description:
How do you change the level from 126 to like 200-250??
I did see one but i lost it lol XD
PM back please

item.title: Change Level
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“elitepro, post:3, topic:262482”]go to client.java

search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

you should see this

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;

make it this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;

were it says return 200; change the 200 to what u want the level to be also change lvl <= 200;[/quote]Eww, you stole my exact code.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Level
item.dc:creator: @elitepro elitepro
item.description:
@elitepro wrote:

go to client.java

search for

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

you should see this

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;

make it this -

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 200; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl;

were it says return 200; change the 200 to what u want the level to be also change lvl <= 200;

item.title: Change Level
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

search for this in player.java::

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {

you change the 99 to the lvl you want, dont go to high then a few lines down is return 99 change that to the max lvl you want.

Read full topic
